TopicTitle: [1.0] BAP-48 Series Mk.III Cargo and Passenger Jet (United Aces of Jeb)

Articles.Content:
![8yW3GS8.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/8yW3GS8.jpg)

From the Untied Aces of Jebediah; engineering corps comes the BAP-48 "Stubby" Series a small/medium sized aircraft which can either carry 48 passengers (hence the name) or a lot of stuff. 

![IDYBom2.png](http://i.imgur.com/IDYBom2.png)

The Technical specs for the BAP-48P (Passenger) are:

Weight: 57.6 Tons

Parts: 29

Fuel: 2765

Top Speed: 275 M/S

Price: $145,870

![G4fgpta.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/G4fgpta.jpg)

The Technical specs for the BAP-48C (Cargo) are:

Weight: 44.1 Tons

Parts: 27

Fuel: 2765

Top Speed: 200 M/S

Price: $58,870

![tAEvY5D.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/tAEvY5D.png?1)

BAP-48P Download:[https://www.dropbox.com/s/8a3z9eq5mkemwof/BAP-48P%20Stubby.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/8a3z9eq5mkemwof/BAP-48P%20Stubby.craft?dl=0)

BAP-48C Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/2hei9ybg4l9647h/BAP-48C%20Stubby.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/2hei9ybg4l9647h/BAP-48C%20Stubby.craft?dl=0)
